author: GurpreetSinghChahal
body:
The NLO QCD+EWK predictions are updated in the openloops package that are needed to generate the Monte Carlo samples with the new Sherpa 2.2.5. We need this feature in 10_3, 10_2 and 9_3

FYI @alberto-sanchez, @qliphy, @efeyazgan
title: NLO QCD+EWK predictions updated in Openloops
